item.title: My First Post
item.description: My Website! Hello World! I just created a personal website for myself. This is not the first website I have created (nor is it the last), but I am still quite proud of it. My motivation There are three main reasons why I created this website: I am a relatively young computer enthusiast and I need to prove that I know how to do computer stuff without actually doing too much computer stuff.
